titles.title: A bill to repeal certain obsolete laws relating to Indians.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Hoeven without amendment. With written report No. 116-132.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 252.
